TheoDORE
====================================

Welcome to the TheoDORE 3 documentation!

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage
   input_generation
   transition_density_analysis
   difference_density_analysis
   chemical_shielding
   plotting
   orbitals_and_densities
   program_specific_information
   keywords

If you have any questions,
write to the `discussion forum <https://sourceforge.net/p/theodore-qc/discussion/>`_,
post an `issue on github <https://github.com/felixplasser/theodore-qc/issues>`_
or send me an email to f.plasser(at)lboro.ac.uk.
